extendedInfo.description: Our application is a great chance to learn the basis of the foreign language fast and effectively. Unique study method. No more grinding repetitive words translation that will slip your mind soon. You're supposed to figure out the meaning like children learn to speak. They link what they hear with what they see and learn the meaning of each word or phrase comparing the differences between actions or things. Nail down the knowledge that you grasp with the help of writing tasks. The full version offers: - 30 lessons with increasing difficulty levels - 1800 words and phrases voiced by male and female native narrators - over 1500 colorful images There is a free version to try before you buy. It contains 3 lessons: from the beginning, middle and the end of the course. They are given to show the method and the course level that we offer About 5 million people all over the world have already chosen our application as a fair companion. Give it a try too! **Check out FAQ if you encounter any issues: http://learnlikekids.com/taxonomy/term/4 **

reviews.author: Marcus Buratto

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Absolutely brilliant app! For those who say that it needs an English translation, it really doesn\'t. Its by knowing the words in English that can intact make the language harder to learn. They don\'t call themselves \'learn like kids\' for fun, its true!   However, I do hope there is some more content in the near future.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mi piace molto!
reviews.comment: I\'m actually considering buy it. Im half Italian and if I don\'t brush up on the language I\'m so dead. XD this had been one of the best apps I found!
reviews.author: Ximena Cordoba

reviews.title: Chrashed
reviews.comment: Application incomplete. Needs to load a file then chrashed...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Surprisingly fun and easy to learn
reviews.comment: No english, just pictures; You quickly work out what words mean though. But for more complex sentences, I think there should be an english translationn, at end. Can\'t complain though, considering buying full version.
reviews.author: Missy Chester

reviews.title: THIS APP SUCKS!!
reviews.comment: Everytime I open it my screen locks. It wont even let me unlock my screen. # MyTouch 4g
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I was really looking forward to this app, but everytime I try to open it turns my phone off. :(
reviews.author: Coellie Parayno

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Great app. However it could use English translations so you can really go in depth with the learning.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I\'ve learned more in an app in two minutes than I have in my Italian class in one semester.

reviews.title: Great!
